Raichu (TCG)

From Bulbapedia, the community-driven Pokémon encyclopedia.
Jump to navigationJump to search
← #0025: Pikachu
Pokémon
#0027: Sandshrew →
For Pokémon TCG Pocket cards, see Raichu (TCG Pocket).

Raichu has been featured on 56 different cards since it debuted in the Base Set of the Pokémon Trading Card Game. Raichu cards are normally Lightning-type Stage 1 Pokémon.

List of Pokémon cards featuring Raichu

Raichu
Cards listed with a blue background are only legal to use in the current Expanded format.
Cards listed with a green background are legal to use in both the current Standard and Expanded formats.
